core_meaning: Square between Mercury and Neptune drives friction/work. Mercury: analysis, communication, commerce, learning, tech. Neptune: . General tenor: growth via friction; endurance and clear boundaries are key.

facets.career: Negotiation, analytics, documentation, skilling.  Emphasis: friction/work.
facets.money: Trading, freelancing, multi-stream income, contracts.  Emphasis: friction/work.
facets.health_adj: Nervous system, breath, routine mobility.  Emphasis: friction/work.

risk_notes: Friction escalating into conflict; respect pacing and boundaries.

applying: Prepare and initiate aligned actions; set intent and book resources. (Mercury: draft, analyze, negotiate; Neptune: act, iterate, measure; tone: friction/work).
Skill-up or pre-negotiate; clear blockers proactively. (Mercury: draft, analyze, negotiate; Neptune: act, iterate, measure; tone: friction/work).
exact: Announce, pitch, launch, or sign; maximize visibility. (Mercury: draft, analyze, negotiate; Neptune: act, iterate, measure; tone: friction/work).
Make the decisive call; accept/decline offers consciously. (Mercury: draft, analyze, negotiate; Neptune: act, iterate, measure; tone: friction/work).
separating: Consolidate gains, document learnings, adjust guardrails. (Mercury: draft, analyze, negotiate; Neptune: act, iterate, measure; tone: friction/work).
Close loops, stabilize routines, prune scope creep. (Mercury: draft, analyze, negotiate; Neptune: act, iterate, measure; tone: friction/work).

dignity_adjustment.notes: Optional: adjust weights by sign/hse dignity e.g., exalt/debilitation.

retrograde_adjustment.notes: Optional: if either planet retrograde, temper extroversion; increase review loops.

hi.title: Mercury Square Neptune (हिन्दी)
